sentences.en: Kick the ingrate out of the country.
sentences.cn: 把这个忘恩负义的混蛋踢出我们的国家。

sentences.en: She gathered her belongings and headed to the gate, refusing to look back at the ingrate thief.
sentences.cn: 她收拾好了行李，走向登机口，根本不想再看一眼那忘恩负义的小偷。

sentences.en: They are sometimes accused of bankrolling an ingrate—the American government—which says thanks by grumbling about the yuan.
sentences.cn: 他们有时被指责给那些忘恩负义的人提供资金——美国政府——通过职责人民币来到谢。

sentences.en: Too late to apologize, she realized with grief, that she was the rude one, the ingrate, the thief.
sentences.cn: 她悲哀地意识到，道歉已经太晚，她才是那个不讲理的、忘恩负义的、偷了曲奇饼的人。
